channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: New Orleans plans to reopen Bourbon Street as FBI seeks clues about truck attack that killed 15
item.description: President Biden says the veteran who drove a pickup truck into a crowd in New Orleans had posted videos to social media saying he was inspired by the Islamic State group and expressing a desire to kill.

item.title: An aspiring nurse, a football star, a single mother and a father of 2 killed in New Orleans attack
What we know about a vehicle attack on pedestrians in New Orleans that killed at least 15
